pic1_alt: A screenshot of the Time Zone Map from timeanddate.com. The screenshot shows a world map, with colors indicating the current offset in that location from UTC.
pic2_alt: A map of the world from timeanddate.com, with half-hour time zones (St. John's, Venezuela, Iran, AFG, India, Sri Lanka, Myanmar, Autralia (states), and Lord Howe Is.) highlighted in green, and 45-minute time zones (Nepal, Eucla, and Chathan Islands) highlighted in yellow.
